title: Bug 6410: File dirtied by code assist when unchanged
description: When code assist is triggered in the file, it is being dirtied even though the code assist has nothing to suggest. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The file is being dirtied, but there are no actual changes made by the code assist. Additionally, code assist does not appear.
EB: If code assist does not have any suggestions, it should not dirty the file. Furthermore, code assist should appear as expected.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the file in the editor.
2. Trigger code assist.
3. Observe that the file is dirtied, but no suggestions are presented by code assist.
